idea: Landmark Enviro Care Pvt came with new technology with Hyper Catalase Enzymes. Landmark Enviro Care Pvt offer a path breaking and innovative technology - Hyper Catalase bringing forth a host of advanced and ECO friendly waste management solutions with 100% organic active natural enzymes. Its the most superior enzymes sourced from nature researched, developed from natural accurring microbes found in thriving mangrove ecosystems, a number of bacteria strains and rare yeasts were sourced and clinically concocted through and an advanced vacuum freeze drying process to form Hyper Catalase, which is the catalyst to the bio chemical reaction, able to rapidly remove the waste products from the geogrophical condition .
name: LANDMARK ENVIRO-CARE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Industry Inspire Talks is a next-gen ed-tech startup that is One of Asia's finest Industry Ready platforms for Students, Corporate Professionals & Entrepreneurs which was founded in August 2020 registered under MSME. It is a platform where we invite successful people from the industry to share their career journeys. We inspire people in three ways. We have three categories i.e Interview Series, Podcast Series, Career Stories. We also do Industry oriented Events/ Industry Webinars/ Workshops for our community which involves speakers from around the globe representing different industries/companies. We publish Inspire Stories about ordinary people from the industry who have made an impact in their industry career journeys. Inspire Class, Our new Cohort based concept led by Industry Experts for aspirants to gain foundational knowledge in the focus areas such as Entrepreneurship, Management, Finance, Technology is going to create a boom in the market! Stay tuned, as we start off in September! This is what we do here, We support/inspire/educate Students, Corporates, Entreprenreneurs to achieve greater heights in their careers by helping them connect with successful leaders from the industry! Your career is our priority! Our mission is to empower every person on this planet to achieve more in their future careers. Our vision is to make people around the world future-ready and transform people into Next-Gen Industry leaders.
name: Industry Inspire Talks
